candidates.title: quantum_time modifier
candidates.body:
### Summary

Adds quantum_time to the set of DNA modifiers.

Not strictly necessary, but I found it useful for testing quantized gossip in real world situations, to be able to have data fit into different time chunks at a more rapid pace. 

This uses the default value of 5 minutes. It is a breaking change in that this will change everyone's DNA hash, but it does not require any modification to the DNA itself.

### TODO:
- [ ] CHANGELOG(s) updated with appropriate info
- [ ] Just before pressing the merge button, ensure new entries to CHANGELOG(s) are still under the _UNRELEASED_ heading

candidates.title: New GossipInfo interface method for historical gossip progress
candidates.body:
### Summary

Adds new GossipInfo method, which contains info that can be used to display current progress of historical gossip, both incoming and outgoing, per DNA.

Help me name these things better.

candidates.title: Remove dylib config in Cargo.tomls
candidates.body:
### Summary

I have found that before this change, every change to the `holochain` crate would trigger a re-check of `hdi` and `hdk`. Post this change, I can update `holochain` and only `holochain` gets compiled.

candidates.title: Re-add missing websocket tests
candidates.body:
### Summary

There were some websocket integration tests that were excluded from CI. This fixes them and makes them run.

Also added a `glacial_tests` feature which we could start using for really slow tests. I marked a couple of rather slow tests with this flag. CI script is modified to use the `glacial_tests` feature flag as well.

candidates.title: update hc sandbox to use new lair
candidates.body:
### Summary

`hc sandbox` now uses new lair keystore. Passphrase is required. Similar to lair/holochain `hc sandbox` will now default to interactively requesting the passphrase from the tty, or the user can optionally specify a `--piped` flag to extract the passphrase directly from stdin.
